mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cas_showexh ( PERFORM_CODE, TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, PLACE_NAME, PLAY_TIME, AGE, PLAN_COMPANY, INQUIRY_PHONE, INQUIRY_EMAIL, TICKET_INFO, DISCOUNT_INFO, DISCOUNT_CHARGED, GENRE_NAME, ISOPEN, FILE_URL_MI, FILE_URL_TI, INFO, DETAIL, CAST_INFO, service_tag, regDate, editDate ) VALUES ( #{PERFORM_CODE}, #{TITLE}, #{START_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{PLACE_NAME}, #{PLAY_TIME}, #{AGE}, #{PLAN_COMPANY}, #{INQUIRY_PHONE}, #{INQUIRY_EMAIL}, #{TICKET_INFO}, #{DISCOUNT_INFO}, #{DISCOUNT_CHARGED}, #{GENRE_NAME}, #{ISOPEN}, #{FILE_URL_MI}, #{FILE_URL_TI}, #{INFO}, #{DETAIL}, #{CAST_INFO}, showExh, now(), now() );
